column2: Kornit Digital Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture and marketing of industrial and commercial printing solutions for the garment, apparel and textile industries. The firm focuses on enabling the mass customization of printed textile products. The company provides complete high-speed digital printing solutions, fully integrated and fully in-house made, which include printing systems, inks and consumables, software, pallets and accessories, technical and application support and services. The Companyâ€™s proprietary technology allows to print directly on garments or fabrics enabling to print with one ink set on all types of fabrics and with no additional finishing processes. The firm has offices in the USA, Europe and Asia Pacific, and supplies digital textile printing machines to customers in more than 100 countries worldwide. Additionally, it has a global network of qualified partners distributing its solutions and supporting its customers.
